result.reason: The issue describes a missing option for automatically closing panels after the last tab is closed, which is a desirable feature or a bug in expected behavior.
result.approach: Add a new setting in FrmOptions to allow users to configure auto-closing of panels when the last tab is closed, and implement the corresponding logic in FrmMain to manage panel visibility based on this setting.
